/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements. Cars and bicycles, common modes of transportation in the city, are seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, which illuminates the scene with bright, natural light.
